segments.text: Excuse me , sir . I've made a tough decision and here is my resignation .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am sorry to hear that . Why do you want to quit ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry to bring up my resignation at this moment , but I've decided to study abroad .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you , sir . I'd like to say that I ’ Ve really enjoyed working with you . However , I think it ’ s about time for me to leave .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am glad to work with you , too . Good luck !
segments.speaker: S2
